<MethodEndpoint

Fetches staker stats for babylon staking including active tvl and active delegations.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Public key of the staker to fetch","in":"query","name":"staker_pk_hex","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
